Toggle Menu

System Requirements

Hardware Requirements

Database and web console on same system:

  • 2 GB RAM

Web console only:

  • 1 GB RAM

Database only:

  • 1 GB RAM

Supported Operating Systems

  • Ubuntu 14.04
  • RHEL

Supported Browsers

Modern versions of the following major browsers are supported to access the web console:

  • Chrome
  • Firefox
  • IE 11
  • Safari
